about-content: Hi！我叫曹思源，一般情况下会使用 SR2k 这个网名或者名字的拼音 Siyuan Cao。我现在工作和生活在杭州市。
我总是对创造充满热情，乘着这股热情，我利用这股热情在开发和进步的路上砥砺前行。

experiences.title: 阿里巴巴集团
experiences.subtitle: 实习前端工程师
content: There's a saying that frontend engineers in China are either working for Alibaba, or on the way to Alibaba. So it's really my honor to have this internship experience at Alibaba Inc.
During the internship, I learned about internal solution for various of business, participated in the maintenance of a internal UI component library, and gain a lot of skills for real-world projects.

experiences.title: 天津市崇光科技有限公司
experiences.subtitle: Web 前端开发实习生
content: The internship at Bright Tech is the very first job I've ever got. Yet nothing special.

experiences.title: CSEC 大赛官网
experiences.subtitle: 全栈开发
content: Built with Angular 7 and ASP.NET Core 2.2, the CSEC site is a full solution for the CSEC competition held by Shenzhen University.
Now the site has fulfilled what it's been desired, and has provided thousands of visitors and competitors a convenient service.

educations.title: 天津科技大学
educations.subtitle: 数字出版 学士学位
content: I studied a Bachelor of Arts majoring in Digital Publishing at Tianjin University of Science and Technology in China.

There's a gap between my dream and my major At TUST, so after class I worked hard to establish a good understanding of technical and process skills that are required to excel in the software, especially in web frontend field.

skills.title: 专业工具
items: macOS / Windows 的 GUI 界面
macOS / Linux 的命令行界面
Git / 基于 Git 的协作平台
